product_name: Electra Townie GO! Step-Through Women's Bike - 2014
long_description: The Electra Townie GO! Step-Through Women's Bike is a pedal-assist bike with surprising power. The extra boost kicks in when you need it to help you conquer hills and long distances. The motor monitors your pedaling power and speed, then automatically delivers extra power as you need it. 6061-T6 aluminum frame with steel fork offers high durability, and step-through frame makes mounting and dismounting saddle quick and easy. Flat Foot Technology(R) places rider upright for comfortable, heads-up positioning; aft positioning allows a rider to place both feet on the ground at a stop. Front and rear LED lights are powered by the Hub Dynamo so you'll always have a little extra visibility. The Electra Townie GO! Step-Through Women's Bike features linear-pull brakes, alloy spring tensioners, braided stainless inner wires and cable casings. 30 mi. average distance on full charge (dependent on conditions, terrain and rider); rear-mounted battery charges in 3 - 4 hrs. and offers a maximum assisted speed of 15.5 mph. Specs on the Electra Townie GO! Step-Through Women's Bike are subject to change.
short_description: The Electra Townie GO! Step-Through Women's Bike is a pedal-assist bike with surprising power. The extra boost kicks in when you need it to help you conquer hills and long distances.
